top_comments.comment: Well, we have to admit that Chucky is way sexier than Dave
Violet has out done herself on this cover!!! I absolutely love it!!!!
Not sure if it's the the synth, vocals, or the visuals... Goosebumps every time.

comments_since_last_sample.body: I hope they put this on the show
You should cover uninvited by Alanis Morrisette I think you would do a phenomenal job!
So Violet really is the Bride Of Chucky.  I knew she looked familiar!
"I'll be watching you" would fit with the same tone of this song
Violet has out done herself on this cover!!! I absolutely love it!!!!
Not sure if it's the the synth, vocals, or the visuals... Goosebumps every time.
3:29 failed opportunity for Chucky to play the drum fill

At the beginning: "Oh lord?" Whut? It was "Hold On" originally! I mean your lyrics fit with the iconography, but yeah. Misheard lyrics works well here!  And then at the end it does sound like "Hold On"... you are confusing me! 
Sweet cover though! Love it!

So the audio is utterly epic. Not sure the "in love with Chucky" thing resonated with me- I actually found myself distracted from the music- but when I closed my eyes and just listened, the haunting melodies came through loud and clear. A stunning rendition of the song.
I missed the iconic drum intro a little
I know of a few people who will have nightmares for some time just cause of chucky
Oh my gosh!      What a version!!      Love your spin on this iconic song <3      Keep up the amazing work :D
Elle est magnifique cette version (à toi de traduire 😉)
If I had a woman like that, nothing could make me kill myself. And I say that from someone who has definitely struggled with suicidal thoughts and deep depression.
